org.forgerock.openam.scripting

Class ScriptException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.sun.identity.shared.locale.L10NMessageImpl
          • org.forgerock.openam.scripting.ScriptException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    L10NMessage, Serializable

    public class ScriptException
extends L10NMessageImpl
    General script exception that allows for localised messages.
    Since:
    13.0.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public static ScriptException createAndLogError(org.slf4j.Logger logger,
                                                ScriptConstants.ScriptErrorCode errorCode,
                                                Throwable cause,
                                                String... arguments)
        Convenience method that will log the message represented by the error code and construct a new ScriptException.
        Parameters:
        logger - The logger to which the error should be written.
        errorCode - The error code to use for the exception message.
        cause - The Throwable that caused the error.
        arguments - Arguments used in the message associated with the error code.
        Returns:
        A new ScriptException.
